author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR follows the new Era of Run_3 2023 in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41271
This PR needs to be used with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42327 to complete FastSim setup for 2023.

#### PR validation:
Run private production and compare DQM. One can see better FastSim-FullSim agreement with new era:
+ PFJet Rapidity: https://tinyurl.com/2bnl3p8f
+ Delta R (PFJet-vs-GenJet): https://tinyurl.com/28uxfr3n
+ SumET: https://tinyurl.com/2dmgo4xr
+ ak8PFJetsPUPPI: https://tinyurl.com/28nln9tp
+ NanoAOD, PNetPerJet: https://tinyurl.com/26wbsplf
+ NanoAOD, MET: https://tinyurl.com/2cpo27jh

For all plots:
+ Black: FullSim (private)
+ Blue: FastSim (default, same GEN as FullSim)
+ Orange: FastSim (New era, same GEN as FullSim)
+ Red: FullSim (relvals, as ref)

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
Need backport to 13_0, 13_1, 13_2
title: Add 2023 FastSim Era
